MajorClaims.Text: going to classes should be optional for students
attending classes in the university will not be required to the students anymore

Claims.Text: sometimes the students in the university can learn better from other sources outside the class room
they can manage the time spending on classes to do other benefit things if they already understand topic in the class very well
the students should know what activities they should do at the time and have good management for their learning time

Premises.Text: Student can also study by themselves in the library and focus on only the topic they do not understand
I have a close friend who was in the same department with me in the university
She learned quickly and understood everything in class so fast
she rarely went to class but spent most time to understand confusing topic
she got very good grade when she was graduation
many times I did not attend biology class because my university does not require the students to attend classes
I had already studied all biology topics before attending university
I spent the time of biology class to do my Chemistry research and got A+ for both biology and chemistry
